sections.heading: Internship Program
details: Completed a 500-hour internship at Magsaysay People Resources Corporation. Contributed as a UI/UX and Frontend Developer, focusing on real-world web applications and user-centered design.

sections.heading: Freelance Projects
details: Admin Gym Management System - A web-based platform designed to help gym administrators efficiently manage client subscriptions, monitor payment history, and track daily check-ins and logs. I was responsible for designing the mockups and developing the frontend.

Hiring Management System - A recruitment-focused system developed to streamline job postings, application tracking, and candidate evaluation for recruiters and HR departments. I designed the interface workflows and developed the frontend.

Aignition Global Education Alliance - A platform developed to transform global academic competition management by providing a unified ecosystem for students, administrators, and organizations. I contributed by designing the UI/UX, developing the frontend, and collaborating with the team using Gitflow and ClickUp.

sections.heading: Capstone Collaboration
details: Collaborated with a team on a capstone project as both UI/UX Designer and Frontend Developer. Produced high-fidelity prototypes and contributed to the frontend architecture of a web-based system.

sections.heading: Freelance & Personal Projects
details: Initiated and completed multiple web development projects using modern frameworks including React and Tailwind CSS.

sections.heading: Hackathon Achievement
details: Participated in the Madrid Pangasinan Hackathon and earned 3rd place. Designed and presented a full UI/UX concept to panelists, emphasizing functionality and user experience.

sections.heading: Freelancing & Design
details: Began freelance work in graphic design, frontend development, and video editing. Delivered creative assets and responsive interfaces for various clients.
